title: Havana Club font
content:
Hi everyone,

Does anyone of you know what font Havana Club uses for their wordmark ?

Appreciate it in advance.

Cheers and big thanks,  
Vlad
author: andrei_bva

comments.content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214062647im_/http:/typophile.com/files/havana_5537.jpg)

Looks a lot like Futura Condensed Bold, squarshed a bit.
